languages.text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все союзники с эффектом Приготовиться! получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, а {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытий{/g} для них увеличивается на 20% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. В течение дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели могут использовать только {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} передвижения, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героические акты{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra turn.

All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten, die von Bereit machen für Einschlag! betroffen sind, erhalten einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und erhöhen ihre {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um +20 %. Die Ziele können in diesem Zusatzzug nur Bewegungsfähigkeiten, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentaten{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstaten{/g} einsetzen.
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Alle Verbündeten, die von Bereit machen für Einschlag! betroffen sind, erhalten einen Bonuszug mit 0 AP und 3 BP und erhöhen ihre Deckungseffizienz für 1 Runde um +20%.

languages.text: Tous les alliés affectés par Préparez-Vous à l’Impact ! gagnent un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} sans aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et augmentent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}l’efficacité de leur couverture{/g} de 20 % pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Les cibles ne peuvent utiliser que des capacités de mouvement, des {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actes héroïques{/g}, ou des {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesures désespérées{/g} pendant ce tour supplémentaire.
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés sous l'effet de Préparez-Vous à l'Impact ! bénéficient d'un tour supplémentaire assorti de 0 PA et 3 PD, et l'efficacité de leur couverture augmente de +20 % pendant 1 round.

languages.text: 所有受到迎接冲击！影响的盟友都会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，在此额外回合中拥有0点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。在此额外回合中，受影响的目标只能使用移动能力、{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}。
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: 所有受到迎接冲击！影响的盟友都会获得一个额外回合，在此额外回合中拥有0点行动点数与3点移动点数，同时获得+20掩体效果，持续一轮。

languages.text: Todos los aliados afectados por ¡Preparados para colisión! ganan un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno{/g} adicional con 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} aumenta un +20 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Los objetivos solo pueden usar capacidades de movimiento, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}actos heroicos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medidas desesperadas{/g} en este turno extra.
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados afectados por ¡Preparados para colisión! ganan un turno adicional con 0 PA y 3 PM y su eficacia de cobertura aumenta un +20 % durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: 衝撃に備えろ！の効果を受けているすべての味方は、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}、3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}のボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得て、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽効率{/g}が+20%増加する。
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 衝撃に備えろ！の効果を受けているすべての味方は、1ラウンドの間、0AP、3MPのボーナスターンを得て、遮蔽効率が+20%増加する。

languages.text: Все союзники с эффектом Приготовиться! получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, а {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытий{/g} для них увеличивается на 20% на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. В течение дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цели могут использовать только {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} передвижения, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героические акты{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}.
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Brace for Impact! gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and increase their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets can only use movement {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} during this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Все союзники с эффектом Приготовиться! получают дополнительный ход с 0 ОД и 3 ОП, а эффективность укрытий для них увеличивается на 20% на 1 раунд.
Все союзники с эффектом Приготовиться! получают дополнительный ход с 0 ОД и 3 ОП, а эффективность укрытий для них увеличивается на 20% на 1 раунд.
